attributes.action: Allow Geert Wilders, the Dutch politician with the courage to tell the truth about Islam, to enter this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Blackmail from a Muslim peer, threatening public disorder is unacceptable.

For the UK Government to capitulate to it is deeply, deeply shameful.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
